import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const SleepReview = props => { const totalSleep = totalDurationHours + (totalDurationMinutes * 60) const totalDurationHours = props.sleepEntries.reduce((acc, val) => acc + val.durationHours, 0) const totalDurationMinutes = props.sleepEntries.reduce((acc, val) => acc + val.durationMins, 0) return (

Woohoo!

{/* Add awards */}

Last night Average Change
Sleep duration {props.sleepEntries[props.sleepEntriesLength - 1].durationHours}hrs, {props.sleepEntries[props.sleepEntriesLength - 1].durationMinutes}min {totalDurationHours}
Sleep score {props.sleepEntries[props.sleepEntriesLength - 1].score}
Bedtime {props.sleepEntries[props.sleepEntriesLength - 1].bedtimeHour}:{props.sleepEntries[props.sleepEntriesLength - 1].bedtimeMinutes} {props.sleepEntries[props.sleepEntriesLength - 1].bedtimeAMPM}
) } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { sleepEntriesLength: state.sleepEntries.length, sleepEntries: state.sleepEntries } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, {})(SleepReview);
